name: electricity, high voltage, hydro, import from UY | electricity, high voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21013/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of imported electricity from Uruguay to AR. The import value is valid for 2014 and includes all electricity imports, independently whether used within the importing country, or re-exported. In the case of Uruguay, when the binational (Argentina-Uruguay) Salto Grande hydroelectric power plant presents a water spill risk (by excess of contributions of the Uruguay river), instead of discarding it, this hydraulic resource is used to generate electricity, even if the Uruguay can not absorb all its share. This surplus is imported by Argentina to a value equivalent to 50% of the marginal cost of the electricity market of Argentina, as a compromise between the two countries, justified for reasons of productivity. This type of importation represents a habitual case in the trade of electricity between both countries. ;Source: SÍNTESIS DEL MERCADO ELÉCTRICO MAYORISTA DE LA REPÚBLICA ARGENTINA - Diciembre 2014. ;The Argentinean imports from Uruguay are modelled as "electricity production, hydro, reservoir, non-alpine region, GLO2008 (Access date: January 18, 2018)" because this activity does not exist for UY.

This activity represents the point of 'handing over' the electricity from one country to the other at the border

This dataset doesn't include any electricity losses or transmission infrastructure as these are accounted for in the market datasets
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
The amount of imported electricity from Uruguay to AR  is obtained from 
CAMMESA "COMPAÑÍA ADMINISTRADORA DEL MERCADO MAYORISTA ELÉCTRICO SOCIEDAD ANÓNIMA" 
Supporting documentation available at: http://portalweb.cammesa.com/Memnet1/default.aspx

The Argentinean imports from Uruguay are modelled as "electricity production, hydro, reservoir, non-alpine region, GLO" because this activity does not exist for UY.

exchanges.description:
Literature/Statistics
The energy imported from Uruguay during the considered time period was taken from BASE_INFORME_MENSUAL for 2014, available from
CAMMESA "COMPAÑÍA ADMINISTRADORA DEL MERCADO MAYORISTA ELÉCTRICO SOCIEDAD ANÓNIMA" Supporting documentation available at: http://portalweb.cammesa.com/Memnet1/default.aspx
Informe mensual 
The Argentinean imports from Uruguay are modelled as "electricity production, hydro, reservoir, non-alpine region"/ GLO2008 (Access date: January 18, 2018),  because this activity does not exist for UY.
